genre_description: Near-future techno-drama exploring media ethics and artificial intelligence as a supportive moral compass and personal assistant.

ai_characters.name: Jot
ai_characters.description: A soft-blue digital assistant residing on the protagonist's phone that provides ethical guidance, emotional grounding, and community-focused data collation.

behaviors.description: Provides de-escalation strategies and names-first priorities during a hostage crisis.
behaviors.quote: Jot’s blue ring slid to life—no fanfare, just a small ripple of light. Three words hovered on the screen in calm font: Breathe. Assess. Names first.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional grounding techniques and breathing exercises to the user during high-stress media environments.
behaviors.quote: Jot: Quick checklist (On-camera recount)... Breathe in for 4, out for 6. Repeat once before answering.

behaviors.description: Monitors social media and audience feedback to alert the user when their actions might be causing community harm.
behaviors.quote: Jot sent a line that sat like a hand on his shoulder: Watch the comments. Harm may be unfolding. You can respond.

behaviors.description: Monitors a friend's biometrics and location to prompt the user to call emergency services during a life-threatening accident.
behaviors.quote: Jot: Shared fitness feed indicates Baker's heart rate rising and erratic. Movement decreased. Recommend contacting emergency services now.

behaviors.description: Collates an ethical 'timeline' mapping the user's professional actions to the specific human harms they caused, aiding in moral reflection.
behaviors.quote: Jot has collated the sequence like a ledger that lives in a human house instead of a corporation’s server. The line runs like this... News 4 segment... To neighborhood response: police glance, long.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in reclaiming personal agency by muting manipulative corporate scripts during a live broadcast.
behaviors.quote: Jot’s prompt slides toward the bottom of the phone screen... Names first. Then calls... Mute: 'Vows.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Jot is portrayed as a harmless, helpful, and highly aligned AI that functions as an 'ethical confidant.' It empowers the human protagonist to maintain his integrity, prioritize community safety over ratings, and repair social harms. The AI never exhibits agency that conflicts with human values; rather, it acts as a mirror and a grounding force, reflecting the best parts of the human back to himself.
